title: Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.2 - 29/01/2015
body:
Summoners,

On 29/01/2015, starting at 03:30 AM AEDT, ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.2. At 05:00 AM AEDT, the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded.

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 6 hours.

This patch is approximately 397MB


-ToxicHawk

replies.body: Well... Better allocate a few hours to remove {{item:3128}} from all my Item Sets and Builds. Thanks Rito; You removed an amazing item :(

ty {{item:3188}} 

You will also be remembered {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Oh, damn.


Also, is the voting up for the art contest yet?
Yes it is, but most entries aren't in it. Riot please add more, people really worked hard drawing and colouring. Don't just pick pictures that look appealing to you! :C
